table_caption: Difference between AD patients and NC on ddWD-WG and the seed-based FC.Voxel-based ddWD-WGs at nine ranges of Euclidean distance were compared between AD patients and NC. Using the resultant supra-threshold clusters as the seed, the seed-based functional connectivity (FC) was compared between AD patients and NC. The adjusted covariates included age, gender, mean frame-wise displacement for head motion. The significance threshold was set at voxel-level p<0.005 (uncorrected) with a cluster-level p<0.05 (FWE-corrected).
